dialog.name: copy_symbols
dialog.whatsthis:
From library - Displays the current library.

To - Type the name for the destination library. You can also select an open library from the drop-down list.
Click the Folders button to browse for the library folders.
Click the Libraries button to browse for the compressed library.

dialog.name: extract_symbols
dialog.whatsthis:
Form library - Displays the current library.

To - Type the name for the destination folder. You can also select a folder by clicking the Folders button.
Click the Folders button to browse for the library folder.

dialog.name: find_symbols
dialog.whatsthis: Type the name of the symbol you want to find and click the Find button. You may also type wildcards, if you do not know the precise name of the file. After you click the Find button, a message box will pop up telling you the result of finding. The found symbols will be highlighted in the Library Manager.

dialog.name: find_symbols_in_libraries
dialog.whatsthis: Type the name of the symbol you want to find. You may type wildcards if you do not know the precise name of the file.

All symbol library search paths - Select this option to search for the specified symbols in the symbol library search paths.

In folder - Select this option to search for the specified symbols in a particular folder or library. Type the name of the folder or library in the edit box. If you enter the name of a binary library, only that library will be searched. If you enter the name of a folder, that folder and any binary library in that folder will be searched.

Look in all sub-folders - Select this option to look in all sub-folders of the specified folder.

Browse - You can also click the Browse button to browse for the folder.
Click the Find button to search for the specified symbols. A message box will pop up telling you the result of finding. The found symbols will be highlighted in the Library Manager window.

dialog.name: open_from_search_paths
dialog.whatsthis: The list box lists all the symbol libraries in your search paths. Select one from the list and click the OK button. The selected library will be opened in the Library Manager with the first symbol in the library selected.

dialog.name: rename_symbol
dialog.whatsthis: Type the new name for the selected symbol and click the OK button, the new name will be accepted.
